text: Fir’auni aca avuga ati:- mbega mwamwemeye imbere yuko ndabaha uruhusha, ntankeka niwe mukuru wanyu yabigishije ubu burozi, rero, nzobaca amaboko yanyu hamwe n’amaguru yanyu ndabikabishije ukuboko kw’iburyo n’ukuguru kw’ibubanfu n’ukuboko kw’ibubanfu hamwe n’ukuguru kw’iburyo hanyuma nce ndaba bamba kubishitsi vy’ibiti vy’imitende, ntankeka muzoca mutahura neza uwariwe muri twebwe akaze cane muguhana nukubi bandanya
